scene_description_enriched: An angel, radiating golden light and bearing a scroll with the inscription "Gloria in excelsis Deo," descends from a blue, star-filled sky. Below, two shepherds, one in a pink and blue robe and the other in a blue tunic, gaze upwards in awe. They are accompanied by sheep and a cow. The scene is set in a pastoral landscape with rolling hills, trees, and sparse vegetation, enclosed within an arched frame decorated with foliate motifs.
